input: Who among the following was not a member of the Drafting Committee of the Constitution of India?
explanation: The Drafting Committee for framing the constitution was appointed on 29th August 1947.The committee comprised of a chairman and six other members. The committee members were:- Dr B. R. Ambedkar(Chairman), K M Munshi, Alladi Krishnaswamy Iyer, N Gopalaswami Ayengar, B L Mitter, Md. Saadullah and D P Khaitan.
